about_the_game:
Original Soundtrack for the Epic Adult RPG Adventure, Sex Quest. This product contains the complete original soundtrack to the amazing adult adventure for your listening pleasure. The music created by legendary composer Mark Beensen was recorded live in Munich, Germany utilizing a full 20 piece orchestra over the period of two weeks. Frequently referred to as a complete cinematic soundtrack, this original recording is a relaxing journey into a new world that will both excite and relax the listener.

The sound track does not contain any adult references or sounds and is entirely composed of music only.

content_descriptors.notes: Referenced game includes depictions of sexual intercourse between adult game characters

name: Sex Quest Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 64 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 100 MB available space

short_description: Original Soundtrack for the Epic Adult RPG Adventure, Sex Quest. Sex Quest is an epic adult RPG adventure where you play a nymph warrior maiden who is tasked with freeing the kingdom from the grasp of an evil goblin warlock who has enslaved the king.
